summary: In 1970s Athens a group of professional burglars plan an emerald heist from the home of a gem collector but the corrupt Greek police inspector Abel Zacharia is on their trail.
cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo|Omar Sharif|Dyan Cannon|Robert Hossein|Nicole Calfan|Myriam Feune de Colombi|Raoul Delfosse|José Luis de Vilallonga|Renato Salvatori|Marc Arian|Alice Arno|Steve Eckardt|Roger Lumont|Remo Mosconi|Pamela Stanford|Daniel Vérité
title: El furor de la codicia
